PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-00242014-01-28,  CIC,  PS,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to limit the issuance of study permits to international students attending designated learning institutions defined in the Regulations, which include institutions designated by a provincial/territorial ministry of education.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0014 Publication Date: 2014-02-12
AttachmentsAttachment
